mapper.sql: ${table-alias}.id as `${column-prefix}id`, ${table-alias}.name as `${column-prefix}name`, ${table-alias}.code as `${column-prefix}code`, ${table-alias}.menu_id as `${column-prefix}menu_id`, ${table-alias}.create_time as `${column-prefix}create_time`, ${table-alias}.modify_time as `${column-prefix}modify_time`, ${table-alias}.creator_id as `${column-prefix}creator_id`, ${table-alias}.modifier_id as `${column-prefix}modifier_id`, ${table-alias}.deleted as `${column-prefix}deleted`
